CustomField.formula:
IF(
OR( AND (MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) > 6, YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) == YEAR(TODAY())-1, OR(YEAR(Completion_date__c) == YEAR(TODAY()), YEAR(Completion_date__c) == YEAR(TODAY())+1) ),
AND(MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) <=6, YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) == YEAR(TODAY()), OR(YEAR(Completion_date__c) == YEAR(TODAY()), YEAR(Completion_date__c) == YEAR(TODAY())+1) ) ) , TRUE, FALSE )
CustomField.label: Program Year Date
